title: James Corden strikes a pose for The Price Is Right
text:
James Corden strikes a pose for The Price Is Right James Corden strikes a pose for The Price Is Right 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
James Corden has proved such a hit with US TV audiences he‚Äôs now branched out into ‚Äúgame show modelling‚Äù. 
The Late Late Show host tried his hand at a spot of prize posing when he dropped into The Price Is Right studios. This morning, catch @JKCorden as a male model on @PriceIsRight 's #BigMoneyWeek ! pic.twitter.com/lPRJWcEMSB 
‚Äî The Late Late Show (@latelateshow) October 12, 2015 
The British-born star made the switch to daytime TV and joined host Drew Carey on the popular US title, where he replaced the usual model, also called James. 
‚Äî The Price Is Right (@PriceIsRight) October 12, 2015 
In true family game show tradition, the Gavin And Stacey star struck a pose next to the prize car. 
Host Drew joked: ‚ÄúWe can‚Äôt have a male model on the show unless it‚Äôs a hot guy named James.‚Äù 
‚Äî The Price Is Right (@PriceIsRight) October 12, 2015 
James himself said of his stint, which also saw him pose on a motorbike and rock out with musical instruments: ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs nice to get back to my roots, to my modelling days.‚Äù #BigMoneyWeek kicks off with @JKCorden guest modeling! (So üî•) http://t.co/LOBkRV0V1v #PriceIsRight pic.twitter.com/oHdRlRXZPv Share article
